title: Tiramisu cake
description: Like Mary Berry herself, this version of tiramisu is elegant, generous and very sweet. Equipment and preparation: You will need a 38x25cm/15x10in Swiss roll tin, a 18cm/7in square tin and a cook's thermometer.
ingredients: a little softened butter, for greasing
100g/3½oz dark chocolate, (70% cocoa solids), finely chopped
